author: gilles
msg: - Update config file to last changes

author: gilles
msg: - dao.config, sqlMap.config, providers.config must be place in the base directory of the application domain (same dir as app.config or web.config)
- Rethink 'url', 'resource' notion (resource are loaded from the root directory of the application (relative path), url are absolut path file:///c:/config/my.properties)
- Removed support for 'Magic string', no more need use resource attribute.
This will the last change for release of Monday, I hope :)
